topics.title: Location Tracking
topics.text: Let the app create your personal diary, depending on the places you visited

slides.title: I know what you did last summer ...
slides.text: ... and anytime in between. Because your phone stores the places where you stay. And when you were there. Travel Diary brings both together to create your personal diary

slides.title: Your Personal Diary ...
slides.text: ... is automaticaly created in the background. Even when the app is not active

slides.title: Collect Infos and Pictures
slides.text: Each place where you stayed for a few minutes to hours or days, is logged and Infos and pictures from your camera roll are shown together with an aerial photo

topics.title: Around You
topics.text: Find interesting spots around your current location and navigate there via maps or a direction pointing compass

slides.title: Places you visited
slides.text: See all places on the map, where you have been. Worldwide!

slides.title: Have you already visited ...
slides.text: Look at the list of Wikipedia entries around your location. And you can get there quickly using the direction compass or the Apple Maps navigation ...

topics.title: Directions
topics.text: Find any address, coffee shop, hotel or enter concrete coordinates and navigate there via Apple Maps or by using a destination pointing compass

slides.title: Adresses and Points of Interest
slides.text: Regardless of whether you are looking for an address, a nearby cafe, or a destination like a castle or a museum ... the app will find everything and get you there right away

slides.title: Destination Compass
slides.text: The destination compass shows you the exact direction from your current location to the previously selected destination. By the way: It's even more convenient on the Apple Watch

slides.title: Apple Maps Navigation at your fingertips
slides.text: From every entry - no matter whether from your diary list, the Wikipedia entries or from the local area search - you can easily start the navigation in Apple Maps
